sentence: That’s more than the combined fundraising totals of the two leading Democrats, former Maricopa County Recorder Adrian Fontes and state House Minority Leader Reginald Bolding, who respectively raised about $385,000 and $200,000 for the year.
title: Trump followers zero in on secretary of state campaigns

sentence: Secretaries of state races in Arizona, Nevada, Michigan and Georgia are receiving lots of attention, said Adrian Fontes, a candidate for secretary of state in Arizona.
title: Dems fear for democracy. Their big donors aren’t funding one of its main election groups.

sentence: On the Democratic side, former Maricopa County Recorder Adrian Fontes and state House Minority Leader Reginald Bolding are vying for the nomination, with national groups largely sitting out the contested primary so far.
title: Who will run the 2024 election? They’re on your ballot in 2022.
